content: पारिया(पा)त्रः <ab>N.</ab> of one of the seven principal mountain ranges; <ls>R. 18. 16</ls>; see कुलाचल.
पारियात्र One of the principal mountain chains in India. It is probably the same as the Sewalik mountains which run parallel to the Himālaya and guard the Gangetic Doab on the north-east.
